sessions.name: Directives Masterclass
sessions.abstract: In this session you will learn the ins and outs of directives!

sessions.name: Scopes for fun and profit
sessions.abstract: This session will take a closer look at scopes.  Learn what they do, how they do it, and how to get them to do it for you.

sessions.name: Well Behaved Controllers
sessions.abstract: Controllers are the beginning of everything Angular does.  Learn how to craft controllers that will win the respect of your friends and neighbors.
